data.Name: Mosaic Materials
data.Tagline: Mosaic Materials is dedicated to reducing the costs and environmental impact of fossil fuels.
data.About: Mosaic Materials is dedicated to reducing the cost and environmental impact of fossil fuels through the application of proprietary, highly efficient gas separation technologies. We utilize porous solids known as metal-organic frameworks to selectively remove impurities such as CO2 from gas mixtures in an array of applications from submarines to power plants.
